body: @Gandeloft Thank you for the pixiv link, lad.

@loliconvict: We are reading through the narrative of the protagonist, if he may be called that. To his knowledge, probably because she told him so, she was a virgin prior to him. As the story develops, he ponders whether or not she has prior experience, or in other wors, if she lied to him. This is all my assumptions, but the point is that it's not hard to understand why seeemingly she was a virgin on page one, but wasn't on the last page.
There are 4 more parts to this currently. Here's a link to this work on the artist's Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/81792339 You can also find the following 4 parts there.
Way too short. Other than that, pretty good.
Surprised that the fact she was underage wasn't a "pressing matter" but okay lol
I want a gf like that :')
